name: Casual Techniques #3
description:
Free as part of The Reactor: https://www.patreon.com/Clickteam

In our third casual techniques example pack you have access to 11 open source MFAs that provide code to make your own puzzle games from a 2d Portal engine to Tetris!

Examples Include

  • 2d Portal platformer
  • Snake
  • Tetris
  • Sliding Puzzle
  • Make Words like Baba is You
  • Word Puzzles
  • Shape Puzzles
  • Cut up image example
  • Sokoban
  • The Same Cube
  • Addicube
